title: How to Live with a Neurotic Cat
description: Cat owners know the truth: cats, in fact, own them and their feline needs must be metâ€”sooner rather than later. In this delightfully irreverent book, highlighted by Jackie Geyer's evocative illustrations, the author of the highly successful, How to Live with a Neurotic Dog , offers coping mechanisms for those who struggle with the endless task of keeping their cats pampered and therefore happy.
author: Stephen Baker
